list_definition.definition: a sudden, short and usually unexpected attack

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The enemy made a raid on the docks
The police carried out a raid on the gambling den.
The police raided the drug dealer’s house.
I’m hungry – let’s raid the fridge.
